author: jm
msg: bug 2563: fixed rules to avoid an FP, testing

author: djencks
msg: keep the gbeans in a deployment context in a queriable container/registry.  Start using the query facility to resolve jndi references.  GERONIMO-552

author: rich
msg: Added an 'action' attribute for forwarding to actions (the main use for this is forwarding to shared flow actions) on @Jpf.SimpleAction, @Jpf.Forward, and @Jpf.ConditionalForward.  It basically has the same semantics as 'action' on the netui:anchor tag.
